rev.desc.rev.desc: added statements to panel set.fields.slo (the setup of $G.sla.orig and $G.sla.suspend) which are later used during the creation of slaactive records in RAD=sla.rebuild.slaactive
Added processing to both the start and set.fields.slo panels, populating $L.index.slaorig and $G.sla.orig; $G.sla.orig is used when upgrade processes clock data in RAD=sla.rebuild.slaactive.

Modified the condition on panel=validate.initial and panel=validate.final to eliminate the reference to the global variable for pmstatus values, and instead reference the status progression states from the update slamodulecontrol rec. New panel added called get.slamodctrl which grabs the probsummary rec in this table.

descript.descript: added statements to panel set.fields.slo (the setup of $G.sla.orig and $G.sla.suspend) which are later used during the creation of slaactive records in RAD=sla.rebuild.slaactive
Added $G.sla.names and $G.sla.initial.states to both the start and set.fields.slo panels.

Modified the condition on panel=validate.initial and panel=validate.final to eliminate the reference to a global variable, and instead reference the status progression states from the update slamodulecontrol rec. New panel added called get.slamodctrl which grabs the probsummary rec in this table.
